name: Please don't litter
description:
A PS1 style game where you have to collect garbage.

In one of the cities, a certain anomaly has appeared, which every 10 seconds will spawn tons of garbage. Because of what the city turned into a dump.

You work as a garbage collector, your task is to collect garbage and recycle it.

The game was made in 72 hours for ludum dare 51 with on theme "Every 10 seconds".

Controls: Move - WASD Run - Shift Interact - LMB Grab object - Hold LMB Throw object - RMB Rotate object - Q,E Zoom object - Mouse scroll
